Welcome to Nexus1’s documentation!¶

This project is a backend system called Nexus1, designed to provide a modular approach for managing various functionalities. It includes authentication, controllers, API endpoints, MySQL integration, and utilities. Below you’ll find the detailed documentation of each module.

Contents:

  • Authentication Module
  • Controllers Module
  • Endpoints Module
  • Models Module
  • MySQL Module
  • Utils Module
